name: Happy Christmas | Coloring pages
description:
Kids will have hours of fun with this Christmas-themed educational game. There are puzzles to complete, connect the dots, pictures to color and memory activities. A great way for kids to learn while having seasonal holiday fun and enjoying the holiday spirit!

Christmas Paint - Coloring pages
Enjoy wonderful Christmas spirited coloring pages in a unique and fun coloring game. Select from the collection of Christmas pages color and save your drawing in the Christmas picture album.

Christmas Dots - Connect the Dots
Help Santa learn to count and connect the dots to discover what is hidden under the mysteriously arranged numbers!

Christmas Memory - Memory Match
Can you find all the Christmas elements identical pairs? Complete all pairs to move to the next level. Improve your memory and concentration skills by playing the game again and again.

Christmas Puzzles - Puzzle Fun
High quality, super fun and simple to master Christmas puzzles filled with holiday spirit.
